entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
